title: A year of PS Plus is only $51 for the Pre-Black Friday sale
content:
PlayStation Plus is the only way to experience everything your PlayStation games have to offer. Now you can get a full PlayStation Plus: 12-Month Subscription for $50.99 (reg. $59) if you use the code SAVE15NOV during the Pre-Black Friday sale. 

This PS Plus subscription comes with two free games every month, with some past options including Mortal Kombat X and PGA Tour 2K21. You’ll also get access to exclusive discounts and deals that aren’t available to anyone else except PS Plus subscribers. And with this deal, you get $20 of store credit which can go to building up your library. 

And, most of all, you can game online. Connect with friends, make new enemies, and enjoy having the full experience from some of the most popular games around. Plus, you get cloud storage that will let you upload your saved games and character profiles. 

Get the PlayStation Plus: 12-Month Subscription for $50.99 (reg. $59) with code SAVE15NOV. And remember, you’ll also earn a $20 store credit.

Prices subject to change.
